long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is used for CASQUE SNR Two Factor Authentication.

When activated, this extension will decode the base 64 challenge and display it as a QR code. It can then be scanned by a mobile device and together with a CASQUE smart card token produce a response to the challenge.

The extension can also launch the CASQUE Player App to handle the challenge.
